ViewObject.Name: ProposalConfirmationView
ViewObject.SelectList: Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE, Proposal.COMPANY_ID, Proposal.CONFIRM_NO, Proposal.CONTACT, Proposal.CREATED_BY, Proposal.CREATION_DATE, Proposal.CURRENCY, Proposal.CUST_REG_FLAG, Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE, Proposal.KOMPENSASI_DIPEROLEH, Proposal.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, Proposal.LAST_UPDATED_BY, Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN, Proposal.NOTES, Proposal.PC_TYPE, Proposal.PEMOHON, Proposal.PERIODE_PROG_FROM, Proposal.PERIODE_PROG_TO, Proposal.PROG_DAYS, Proposal.PROG_PROMO, Proposal.PROPOSAL_DATE, Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID, Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO, Proposal.PROPOSAL_TYPE, Proposal.STATUS, Proposal.STD_STM, Proposal.USER_TYPE_CREATOR, Proposal.CONFIRM_DATE, Proposal.PR_CREATED, Proposal.COPY_SOURCE, Proposal.MODIFIER_TYPE, Proposal.BJP_FLAG, Proposal.ARCHIEVE_FLAG, Proposal.PR_REQUEST_ID, Proposal.MOD_REQUEST_ID, Proposal.HIST_REMARK, Proposal.HIST_TRAN_DT_FROM, Proposal.HIST_TRAN_DT_TO, Proposal.CATEGORY_PC, Proposal.MIX_QTY_PROMO, (PROPOSAL.EBS_PR_STATUS) AS STATUS_PR_EBS, (PROPOSAL.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS) AS STATUS_MOD_EBS, (SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,'')) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.STATUS <> 'CANCELED' AND PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO) AS ADDENDUM_LAST, (SELECT PROPOSAL1.EBS_DCV_STATUS FROM PROPOSAL PROPOSAL1 WHERE PROPOSAL1.CONFIRM_NO = PROPOSAL.CONFIRM_NO AND PROPOSAL1.EBS_DCV_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1) AS DCV_FLAG, (SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) AS REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET_COUNT, Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS, Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS, (SELECT CASE WHEN (((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'FINALLY CLOSED' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') OR ( Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'BIAYA' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'FINALLY CLOSED' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'FINALLY CLOSED' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') OR ((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'INACTIVE' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CANCELED'))) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS YELLOW FROM Proposal PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_NO = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO) AS STATUS_YELLOW_FILTER, (SELECT CASE WHEN (((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'IN PROCESS' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'APPROVED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'REJECTED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'BIAYA' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'IN PROCESS' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'APPROVED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'REJECTED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'IN PROCESS' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'APPROVED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'REJECTED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND Proposal.CATEGORY_PC IS NOT NULL AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) = (SELECT COUNT(PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)) AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) > 0))) AND Proposal.STATUS = 'ACTIVE') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS GREEN FROM Proposal PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_NO = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO) AS STATUS_GREEN_FILTER, (SELECT CASE WHEN (((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'BIAYA' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) <> (SELECT COUNT(PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)) AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) = 0)) OR Proposal.CONFIRM_NO = 'Auto Generated') AND Proposal.STATUS = 'ACTIVE') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS RED FROM Proposal PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_NO = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO) AS STATUS_RED_FILTER, (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT PROP.STATUS FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = (SELECT MAX (PPMAX.PROPOSAL_ID) FROM PROPOSAL PPMAX WHERE PPMAX.COPY_SOURCE = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO AND ROWNUM = 1)) = 'CANCELED' THEN 'N' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(PROP.STATUS) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = (SELECT MAX (PPMAX.PROPOSAL_ID) FROM PROPOSAL PPMAX WHERE PPMAX.COPY_SOURCE = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO AND PPMAX.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND ROWNUM = 1)) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_REFERENCED FROM DUAL) AS IS_REFERENCED, (SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0)) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO) AS ADDENDUM_LAST_TRX, (PROPOSAL.EBS_DCV_STATUS) AS PRE_DCV_FLAG, (SELECT NVL(SUM(PPL.NUM_VIEW),0) FROM PRINT_PREV_LOG PPL WHERE PPL.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PRINT_COUNTER, Proposal.PPN_FLAG, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) = (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PR WHERE PR.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID AND PR.CLOSE_FLAG = 'Y') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS CLOSED_ALL_PRODUK, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PRODUK_TOTAL_COUNT
ViewObject.Where: Proposal.CONFIRM_NO IS NOT NULL AND Proposal.STATUS IN ('ACTIVE', 'CANCELED', 'CLOSED')

ViewAttribute.Name: ConfirmDate
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: adf.currentDateTime

ViewAttribute.Name: ProgDaysCount
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: (PeriodeProgTo - PeriodeProgFrom) + 1

ViewAttribute.Name: CanAddendum
StatusPrEbs
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: EbsPrStatus

ViewAttribute.Name: StatusModEbs
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: EbsModifierStatus

ViewAttribute.Name: PromoIsRun
CancelPcPr
CancelPcMod
CanCreatePr
CanCreateMod
AddendumLast
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,'')) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.STATUS <> 'CANCELED' AND PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO

ViewAttribute.Name: IsAddendumLast
StatusPr
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: StatusPrEbs

ViewAttribute.Name: DcvFlag
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT PROPOSAL1.EBS_DCV_STATUS FROM PROPOSAL PROPOSAL1 WHERE PROPOSAL1.CONFIRM_NO = PROPOSAL.CONFIRM_NO AND PROPOSAL1.EBS_DCV_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiItemPaketCount
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DcvPcPrFlag
StatusGreen
StatusYellow
StatusRed
StatusBlock
StatusAddModPr
StatusYellowFilter
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN (((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'FINALLY CLOSED' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') OR ( Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'BIAYA' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'FINALLY CLOSED' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'FINALLY CLOSED' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') OR ((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'INACTIVE' AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CLOSED') AND Proposal.STATUS <> 'CANCELED'))) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS YELLOW FROM Proposal PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_NO = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO)

ViewAttribute.Name: StatusGreenFilter
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN (((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'IN PROCESS' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'APPROVED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'REJECTED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'BIAYA' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'IN PROCESS' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'APPROVED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'REJECTED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'IN PROCESS' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'APPROVED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'REJECTED' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND Proposal.CONFIRM_NO <> 'Auto Generated' AND Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND Proposal.CATEGORY_PC IS NOT NULL AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) = (SELECT COUNT(PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)) AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) > 0))) AND Proposal.STATUS = 'ACTIVE') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS GREEN FROM Proposal PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_NO = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO)

ViewAttribute.Name: StatusRedFilter
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN (((Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'BIAYA' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND (Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'TRANSFERING' OR Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS IS NULL OR Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS = 'ERROR')) OR (Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'PROMOBARANG' AND Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) <> (SELECT COUNT(PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)) AND ((SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) = 0)) OR Proposal.CONFIRM_NO = 'Auto Generated') AND Proposal.STATUS = 'ACTIVE') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS RED FROM Proposal PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_NO = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO)

ViewAttribute.Name: IsReferenced
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT PROP.STATUS FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = (SELECT MAX (PPMAX.PROPOSAL_ID) FROM PROPOSAL PPMAX WHERE PPMAX.COPY_SOURCE = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO AND ROWNUM = 1)) = 'CANCELED' THEN 'N' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(PROP.STATUS) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = (SELECT MAX (PPMAX.PROPOSAL_ID) FROM PROPOSAL PPMAX WHERE PPMAX.COPY_SOURCE = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO AND PPMAX.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND ROWNUM = 1)) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_REFERENCED FROM DUAL

ViewAttribute.Name: AddendumLastTrx
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0)) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO

ViewAttribute.Name: IsAddendumLastTrx
PrintCounter
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT NVL(SUM(PPL.NUM_VIEW),0) FROM PRINT_PREV_LOG PPL WHERE PPL.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: HasAddendum
ClosedAllProduk
ViewAttribute.Expression: (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) = (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PR WHERE PR.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID AND PR.CLOSE_FLAG = 'Y') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END)

ViewAttribute.Name: ProdukTotalCount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)
